parameters.name: options.initialData
parameters.description: The initial value for the data state. Default is null.

parameters.name: options.onSuccess
parameters.description: Global callback triggered when any request initialed by this hook succeeds.

parameters.name: options.onError
parameters.description: Global callback triggered when a request fails after all retries are exhausted.

returnValues.name: data
returnValues.description: The current data returned by the last successful asynchronous operation.

returnValues.name: error
returnValues.description: The error object if the last operation failed.

returnValues.name: isLoading
returnValues.description: true if a request is currently in progress.

returnValues.name: isError
returnValues.description: true if the last operation resulted in an error.

returnValues.name: isSuccess
returnValues.description: true if the last operation completed successfully.

returnValues.name: isIdle
returnValues.description: true if no request has been initiated yet.

returnValues.name: execute
returnValues.description: Function to trigger a new request with custom headers, params, and retry settings.

returnValues.name: mutate
returnValues.description: Directly updates the local data state (useful for optimist UI updates).

returnValues.name: reset
returnValues.description: Cancels pending requests and restores the state to its initial values.

returnValues.name: retry
returnValues.description: Re-executes the last request using the exact same configuration and URL.
